00037

00040 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 class SpResourcePath
00042 {
00043 
00045 public:
00046 
00047 #ifdef WIN32
00048     typedef struct _stat FileStat;
00049 #else
00050     typedef struct stat FileStat;
00051 #endif
00052 
00054 public:
00055 
00056     inline SpString& filepath()
00057     { return m_kFilePath; }
00058 
00059     inline const SpString& filepath() const
00060     { return m_kFilePath; }
00061 
00062     inline SpString& pathname()
00063     { return m_kPathName; }
00064 
00065     inline const SpString& pathname() const
00066     { return m_kPathName; }
00067 
00068     inline SpStringArray& searchpath()
00069     { return m_kSearchPath; }
00070 
00071     inline const SpStringArray& searchpath() const
00072     { return m_kSearchPath; }
00073 
00075 public:
00076 
00077     inline void addPath(const SpString& rkPathname)
00078     { m_kSearchPath.push_back( rkPathname ); }
00079 
00080     SpString getPath(const SpString& rkFilename);
00081     SpString getFile(const SpString& rkFilename);
00082 
00084 public:
00085 
00086     char* loadTextFile(const char* acFilename);
00087     SpString loadTextFile(const SpString& rkFilename);
00088     FILE* loadDataFile(const SpString& rkFilename, const char * acMode = "rb");
00089     int getFileStats(const SpString& rkFilename, FileStat* pkStat);
00090 
00092 private:
00093 
00094     SpString m_kFilePath;

00096     SpStringArray m_kSearchPath;
00097 
00098 };
